sentences.sentence: This is her displayed with the cheering face and pompons!
sentences.translation: 这是她以欢快的表情和(手持)彩球展现的样子！

sentences.sentence: Other ornamental trimmings in the piece, tassels, pompons and similar articles without embroidery, other than knitted or crocheted.
sentences.translation: 其他非绣制成匹装饰带，流苏带(含绒球及类似品，针织或钩编的除外)。
